description: Prepare overnight oats in the evening for a delicious breakfast that's ready to go the next day. Pepitas and sunflower seeds add a wonderful crunch.
name: Overnight Oats, Yoghurt & Berry Parfaits Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place sugar, lemon juice and 2 tbs water in a medium saucepan over medium heat. Cook for 3 minutes or until sugar has dissolved. Add berries. Bring to a simmer. Reduce heat to low and simmer, uncovered, for 4 minutes or until berries have softened. Remove pan from heat and set aside for 30 minutes to cool.
Transfer half of the berry mixture to a blender and blend until smooth.
Combine oats, milk, vanilla and 1 1/2 cups yoghurt in a large bowl. Add blended berry mixture to oat mixture, stirring to combine. Cover and refrigerate overnight.

Spoon half of the oat mixture among 4 x 1 1/4-cup capacity glasses. Top each with 2 tbs of the remaining yoghurt and half of the remaining berry mixture. Divide remaining oat mixture among glasses. Top with remaining yoghurt and berry mixture. Scatter over seeds and serve.
